name: Vertex Space II Confrontation
description:
Vertex Space II Confrontation

A Space Game Aventure

After the great escape, samm, pilot of a satellar kaza, managed to escape the persecution of the krills, who invaded the planet earth and enslaved the human race, samm, travel through the vast space to find the razors, a warrior race who in wars past with the krills, were the only ones that managed to defeat them.

Can you tell them to join him?

Help Samm Be Part of the Great Confrontation !!

--------------------------------------

 We Are In Beta

---------------------------------------
